title: Teaism - Dupont Circle
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Asian-inspired teahouse and restaurant with a few D.C. locations. Offers a variety of teas plus small dishes and mains. Vegan choices include seaweed salad, sweet potato salad, and a veggie bento box. There is a koi pond downstairs. Location is 2 blocks north of Dupont Circle Metro stop.
